content: A few times it's been stated that we might want to limit the amount of nesting for the index page of each guide.
Here's how the User Guide looks, for example, as of 6.3: https://guides.dataverse.org/en/6.3/user/
I just created https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/pull/10847 which limits the nesting to two levels: https://dataverse-guide--10847.org.readthedocs.build/en/10847/user/index.html
I does really looks cleaner and clearer :smile:
As the #docs working group discovered today those preview links from that old pull request above don't work anymore.
But don't worry, I created a fresh PR at https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/pull/11166 and you can preview it at https://dataverse-guide--11166.org.readthedocs.build/en/11166/

@Vaida PlankytÄ— @Dieuwertje Bloemen @Oliver Bertuch (and others) please take a look. If you like it you can leave a pull request and click "Approve".

(If or when Oliver does this, it will move the pull request from "ready for review" to "ready for QA" automatically because he's part of the core team but anyone is welcome to leave a review!)

If something is off, please let me know here or in the PR. Thanks!
@Dieuwertje Bloemen thanks for approving the PR!
We still need a core team member to approve it but I appreciate the show of support!
#11166 has been merged! You can see the change at https://preview.guides.gdcc.io/en/develop/user/index.html now, for example.
